name: TikTok Downloader Bot
description: A Telegram bot to download TikTok videos without any watermark

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot Bot Token, get this value from @BotFather.

API_KEY.description: Your APP API KEY, get this from t.me/ScrapDionRobot

API_HASH.description: Your APP HASH, get this from t.me/ScrapDionRobot

CHANNEL_URL.description: URL of your Telegram channel link.

BOT_URL.description: Username of your Telegram Bot (without @). Example: Tiktok_Downloaderr_Robot

WORKERS.description: Number of threads to use, this depends on usage.  5 is the recommended (and default) amount, but your experience may vary.
